Title: Establishes reduced residential rates for electric and natural gas service to furloughed or non-pay federal workers
Summary: Establishes reduced residential rates for electric and natural gas service to furloughed or non-pay federal workers.
LawCode: Add ยง66-x, Pub Serv L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the public service law, in relation to the establishment of reduced residential rates for electric and natural gas service to furloughed or non-pay federal workers; and providing for the repeal of such provisions upon expiration thereof
